short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly manage your tabs through user-defined configurations or let our advanced AI intelligently group them for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Group Your Tabs++!

Tired of getting lost in a sea of tabs? Group Your Tabs++ is here to help you organize and streamline your browsing experience! With exclusive features and built-in AI, this extension is designed to boost productivity, organization, and control over your tabs in an easy and intuitive way.

Key Features:
AI-Powered Automatic Grouping: By entering your OpenAI API key in the extension settings, you enable automatic tab organization into groups, helping you gather related content and save time. With AI’s support, tab grouping becomes more intuitive and efficient.

Customizable Group Configuration: Create your own groups with specific names, colors, and orders to organize your tabs however you like. The drag-and-drop interface allows for easy group rearrangement. Set keywords and tags for each group, and the extension will automatically sort your tabs into them. Need to delete a group? Just click the minus icon.

Group Saving and Importing: In the Data Settings menu, you can save your groups and AI-generated groups and easily import them into other browsers. This way, your organization remains consistent no matter where you’re browsing.

Enhanced Tab Search Dashboard: With the shortcut Control + Shift + F (or Command + Shift + F on Mac), you can access an efficient search dashboard. Quickly find open tabs by entering a search term or directly selecting a group. If there are no open tabs matching your search term, you can open a new tab directly from the dashboard.

Group Your Tabs++ was developed for anyone looking to optimize their browsing experience and avoid tab overload. Try it out and see how it can transform your browsing, saving you time and helping you quickly access the content that truly matters!

Try Group Your Tabs++ now and take your browsing to the next level!
